name: website_basics
description:
As a customer
    i will be able
    to see all elements of the website and
    to use all navigation elements

output: Test mobile. So i can not set any size of browser

steps.name: I am on the website
I should see all basic mobile elements
I am on the website
I navigate to a subcategory by touching the burgermenu
output: -> clicked title of category on menu

steps.name: I should be on a subcategorysite
I am on the website
I touch the link to my account
I should be on the accountpage for mobile
I am on the website
I touch the link to my notes
I should be on the notepage of mobile
I am on the website
I click the link of the cart
I should see the sidebar of the product cart
I click the link to edit the cart
I should be on the page of the productcart

name: search
description:
As a customer
    I will be able to search for a specific product

steps.name: I am on the website
I am searching for a product by entering the sku in the searchfield
I should be on the detailsite of the related product

name: product_cart
description:
As a customer,
	I want to be able to put a product into my cart
	in order to manage my chosen products

steps.name: I have added a product to the cart
I am on the product cart page
I click on the button to continue shopping
output: i am on mobile -> move on

steps.name: I will see the back on the productsite
I have added a product to the cart
the product cart contains an article
I remove this article from the product cart
the cart should not contain this article

result.error_message:
Element does not exist in cache (status: 10) (Selenium::WebDriver::Error::JavascriptError)
features/base_features/4.product_cart.feature:77:in `Then the cart should not contain this article'

steps.name: I have added a product to the cart
the product cart contains an article
I should see all necessary informations about this article within the product list of the product cart

name: account
description:
As a customer,
	I want to be able to use an account
	in order to manage my user data

steps.name: I am on the registration page
no user account with my email exists
I touch the box to create an new account
I create a new account with my data
output: - set company: Pulsiva GmbH Test - eBusiness
department is not available in de
taxid is not available in de
taxvat is not available in de

steps.name: I should be on my account page
I am on the registration page

elements.name: login with existing account on mobile

steps.name: I already created an user account
I log me out
output: With mobile device use a trick to logout because the way of the menu is too complex

steps.name: I am on the registration page
I touch the box for login
I login with valid informations
I should be on my account page
I am on the registration page

elements.name: modify payment in my account on mobile

steps.name: I am logged in
output: I already created an user account
> and I am already be in my account
I should be on my account page

steps.name: I modify my paymentinfo
output: --> clicked button for change of payment
--> choose checkbox for cash on delivery

steps.name: I should see a confirmation hint
I am on the registration page

elements.name: modify adress of delivery on mobile

steps.name: I am logged in
output: I already created an user account
> and I am already be in my account
I should be on my account page

steps.name: I modify my address for my delivery
output: --> clicked button for change the adress for delivery
I change prefix of my address for delivery

steps.name: I should see an alert for creating a new address
I am on the registration page

elements.name: test links on the accountsite on mobile

steps.name: I am logged in
output: I already created an user account
> and I am already be in my account
I should be on my account page

steps.name: I get all items of the sidebar

name: checkout

As a customer,
	I want to be able to order my favorite products
